description: Manage PostgreSQL databases on a flexible server.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server db create
commands.summary: Create a PostgreSQL database on a flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server db create --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --database-name testDatabase
az postgres flexible-server db create --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --database-name testDatabase \ --charset validCharset --collation validCollation

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server db delete
commands.summary: Delete a database on a flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server db delete --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --database-name testDatabase

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server db list
commands.summary: List the databases for a flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server db list --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver
az postgres flexible-server db list --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --output table

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server db show
commands.summary: Show the details of a database.
examples: az postgres flexible-server db show --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver --database-name testDatabase
